mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.xlh AS "xlh", a.hwlx AS "hwlx", a.ltxh AS "ltxh", a.xfcs AS "xfcs", a.sysj AS "sysj", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO three_shoe_info( id, xlh, hwlx, ltxh, xfcs, sysj, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{xlh}, #{hwlx}, #{ltxh}, #{xfcs}, #{sysj}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE three_shoe_info SET xlh = #{xlh}, hwlx = #{hwlx}, ltxh = #{ltxh}, xfcs = #{xfcs}, sysj = #{sysj}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
